text: Just FYI you guys should feel free to merge anything, you guys own this as much as I and I do not ever want to hold you up! If I ever see anything after the fact we can always adjust :smile_cat:

k, just didnâ€™t want to move forward on an icon without you guys.

would you be interested in doing the submitting to the store?

<@U7ADCU3BM> I might merge in your theme tonight. I think a safe simple way to get it working off the bat is to basically make your theme opt-in through the right click settings menu initially.

Then we can work on having the quick settings in the context menu after.

On the "Site page preview" pane that slides out when you you click on a page in the website pages area, can we add the template its using to that area as well? Would save us dev's a click when someone's like "Hey can you add something to X page" without telling us a particular template.
its not often it happens after a site is live, but during a build phase, it can happen alot

nice! Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
And sorry to be out in the last sprint before the publish but I am running out of time here with a deadline too :sweat_smile:
